meanings.definition: The quality or state of being cumulative.
meanings.sent1: The cumulativeness of the snowfall made it difficult to drive.
meanings.sent2: The cumulativeness of the savings in her piggy bank was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The cumulativeness of jokes in the comedy show kept the audience laughing.
meanings.sent4: The cumulativeness of knowledge in her mind was like a library of wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The cumulativeness of dust on the shelves was a reminder to clean regularly.

meanings.definition: The tendency to accumulate or increase over time.
meanings.sent1: The cumulativeness of chores seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent2: The cumulativeness of interest on the loan was concerning.
meanings.sent3: The cumulativeness of snacks in the pantry was tempting.
meanings.sent4: The cumulativeness of traffic during rush hour was frustrating.
meanings.sent5: The cumulativeness of leaves falling in autumn painted a beautiful scene.
